definitions: A sauce, typically a vinaigrette, mayonnaise-based sauce, or creamy sauce, used to flavor salads.
A mixture of oil, vinegar, spices, and other ingredients, used to add flavor and moisture to salads.
examples: I prefer ranch salad dressing on my greens.
She made a homemade salad dressing with olive oil and lemon juice.
The restaurant offers several types of salad dressing.
